name: Booster Extension
author: ThemeInWP

sections.description:
Booster Extension is a free WordPress plugin that supercharges your site with awesome powerful features. There’re numerous plugins in the official WordPress repository that promises to provide the features that we offer, however if you install them all, there’s inconsistency in their backend and frontend styles and possible plugin conflicts. That’s why we’ve created Booster Extension, adding all the essentials components for every WordPress blog or magazine.

Features

Social share with share count
Sharing buttons increase traffic and engagement by helping readers share your posts and pages to their friends on social media. Booster Extension enables your website users to share the content over Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Pinterest and Email. This is the Simplest and Smoothest Social Sharing plugin with an awesome visual appearance.

Calculate and Display Read Time
Do you want to display estimated post reading time in your WordPress blog posts? Booster Extension let’s you easily add an estimated reading time to your WordPress posts. An estimated reading time encourages users to read a blog post instead of clicking away.

Reaction Buttons and Feedback Emoji
Booster Extension helps you to collect user feedback using the most spoken language in the world: the emoji. Increase your audience engagement in a fun way for your users.

Author Box with Social Profiles
Booster Extension adds a responsive author box at the end of your posts, showing the author name, author gravatar and author description. It also adds over 30 social profile fields on WordPress user profile screen, allowing to display the author social icons.

Like/Dislike Post
Booster Extension increases the interaction with the WordPress post by enabling likes and dislikes buttons along with the count. You can choose either Thumbs Up/Thumbs Down or Smiley/Frown.

License

License: GPLv2
License URI: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html
sections.installation:
Using The WordPress Dashboard

* Navigate to the 'Add New' in the plugins dashboard
* Search for Booster Extension
* Click Install Now
* Activate the plugin on the Plugin dashboard

Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

* Navigate to the 'Add New' in the plugins dashboard
* Navigate to the 'Upload' area
* Select booster-extension.zip from your computer
* Click 'Install Now'
* Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

* Download booster-extension.zip
* Extract the booster-extension directory to your computer
* Upload the booster-extension directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
* Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Setting Options

* Setting Page is located as BE Booster Extentions on your Dashboard

Permalink Setup

* Go to Settings -> Permalinks and click on "Save Changes" if your custom post type redirects you to 404 page.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Plugin submitted to http://wordpress.org.

1.0.1

  • Author Box After content issue fixed.

1.0.2

  • Optimized like functionality.
  • Added reaction feature.
  • Optimized codebase.
  • Added addtional icon set for like/dislike.

1.0.5

  • Fixed Author Box user id issue on shortcode.
  • Fixed post like dislike calculate issue.
  • New Icon set for like/dislike and reaction.

1.1.0

  • Page visit count added.
  • Update code flexibility.
  • CSS update.

1.1.1

  • Add action for view count.
  • Update the_content filter.

1.1.2

  • fixed read time count issue.
  • Update post visit count issue.
  • Update post reaction script

1.1.3

  • fixed like dislike issue

1.1.4

  • Added VK Share icon.

1.1.5

  • Fixed minor issue.

1.1.6

  • Fixed issue on read time second appearance.
  • Fixed Typo Issue.
  • Regenerate pot file.
  • Added wpml-confog.xml file.

1.1.7

  • Added custom field for user to choose avatar image and background image.
  • Widgets input field design upgrade.

1.1.8

  • Post Bookmark feature added.
  • Fixed minor issue.

1.1.9

  • SVG icon issue fixed.

1.2.0

  • Update: 6.2 compatibility check
  • Deprecated: get_page_by_title

1.2.1

  • Update: Hiding email addresses by default
  • Update: Twitter Icon
  • Update: Bookmark Icon
sections.reviews:
icon alternatives are ....

By seacterate on April 18, 2023

The plugin is nice. but it is bad that there are no icon options. I think an alternative should be added. or we should be able to add icons. icon alternatives are insufficient.

Super cool Survival kit plugin

By abelkatz on February 21, 2022

All what you need widget like a Swiss Knife.

Great and very helpful plugin

By muadhabdulaziz on February 22, 2021

I love this plugin. Big Thanks to developers

no script kiddies

By kootenayboy on November 8, 2020

when you try to adjust what social media to display it accuses you of being a script kiddie I get enough negative comments in real life I do not need to add apps to do it too

Add a social network VK and copy the link

By andreylio on July 30, 2020

Hello plugin developers! Please, add the VK social network and copy the link. We are missing these opportunities.

Güzel eklenti

By sivereksonhaber on December 3, 2019

Kurulumu basit ve kullanımı kolay. Henüz eklenti kaynaklı bir ağırlaşma olmadı. Aslında whatsapp eklenseydi çok daha güzel olurdu. İngilizcem çok iyi olmadığı için Türkçe yazdım, umarım çeviri de sıkıntı yaşanmaz :)

Cool Plugin

By denicocc on November 20, 2019

All in one social media features - like/dislike, social share/count, read time and author box in one plugin. Easy to add to automatically or manually using shortcode. Wish there is more sharing option in social share. Awesome...
